name: Top Gap
description: 20 points if the toplaner has a better KDA than their opponent

name: Jungle Gap
description: 20 points if the jungler has a better KDA than their opponent

name: Mid Gap
description: 20 points if the midlaner has a better KDA than their opponent

name: ADC Gap
description: 20 points if the ADC has a better KDA than their opponent

name: Support Gap
description: 20 points if the support has a better KDA than their opponent

name: EU BrokenBlade
description: 20 points per kill or assist by your toplaner. 25 if it is BrokenBlade

name: EU Razork
description: 20 points per kill or assist by your jungler. 25 if it is Razork

description: 20 points per kill or assist by your midlaner. 25 if it is Caps

name: EU Carzzy
description: 20 points per kill or assist by your ADC. 25 if it is Carzzy

name: EU Hylissang
description: 20 points per kill or assist by your support. If it is Hylissang, gain 10 additional points for each of his deaths

name: Rookie Caliste
description: 20 points per kill or assist by your ADC. If it is Caliste, gain 1 extra point for each kill or assist for every time you have played this card on him this season

description: 20% additional points on a winning bet on KCORP or KCORP Academy

name: Dragon Slayers
description: 50 points per dragon slain by your team

name: Tower Down
description: 25 points per turret destroyed by your team

name: Flame Horizon
